mapper.sql: id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, contact_summary, next_contact_time, description, address
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_customer
id,
owner,
name,
website,
phone,
create_by,
create_time,
edit_by,
edit_time,
contact_summary,
next_contact_time,
description,
address,
#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tbl_customer
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=DATE},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_customer set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=DATE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer (id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time, contact_summary, next_contact_time, description, address) values (#{id}, #{owner}, #{name}, #{website}, #{phone}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{description}, #{address})
mapper.select:
select c.id, c.name, u.name as owner, c.phone, c.website from tbl_customer c inner join tbl_user u on u.id = c.owner
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner}, '%')
and c.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and c.website like concat('%', #{website}, '%')
order by create_time desc limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from tbl_customer c inner join tbl_user u on u.id = c.owner
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and u.name like concat('%', #{owner}, '%')
and c.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
and c.website like concat('%', #{website}, '%')
mapper.update: update tbl_customer set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=DATE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select name from tbl_customer where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
